### About Me

I am a health economist and dentist researching topics relating to health financing, health workforce and global health. I will begin my Wellcome Trust/NIHR School for Primary Care Research funded doctoral research fellowship in October 2024.

### Education

-   **PhD in Primary Care and Health Services Research**\
    *University of Manchester* (Incoming 2024)

-   **MSc Economics of Public Policy**\
    *Barcelona School of Economics* (2023-2024)

-   **MSc Public Health (Health Economics)**\
    *London School of Hygiene and Tropical Medicine* (2019-2020)

-   **Bachelor of Dental Surgery**\
    *Queen Mary, University of London* (2015-2021)

### Experience

-   **Pre-Doctoral Clinical Research Fellow**\
    *University of Manchester* (2022-2024)

-   **General Dental Practitioner**\
    *National Health Service (NHS)* (2021-2024)
